English: Earning a genius’s ear through persistence
Twice the effort for half the reward
Living a life of relentless upheaval
To pass on with unfinished business
Turn pale at the very mention
Banding together against a common foe
Supporting each other through thick and thin
Putting things in the same basket
In a state of serene bliss
Wearing one’s joy on one’s face
With a long and rich history
